string.value: Retrieving the Storybook : The Goblin Tale
I heard the Helios Tower Library has been ruined. I need to go check it out...

Wiz the Librarian seemed very concerned about the mix-up of the storybook on The Goblin Story, and he wished to get the story straight and find the storybook that actually does present the story in the right order.
Through the request from Wiz the Librarian, I have managed to straighten out the Goblin Tale and acquired the fixed storybook, afterwhich I headed back to Wiz and gave him the book.

Oh, no. The storybook on the Goblins has been affected by the cracked dimension caused in Ludibrium, and now the pages are totally out of whack. I'm afraid that something terrible might have happened to the Goblins right about now.

Unfortunately, I cannot leave this library right now. It's my duty to stay in the library and take care of the books. It's not something I can skip. If you are on your way to the Folk Town by any chance, then please straighten out the Goblin Story and acquire the fixed storybook for me.
If this library is not fixed soon, the numerous stories of the Folk Town will be jumbled up, and the whole town will be in a state of chaos.

You must have gotten the story straight. If you return this book to its exact spot in the library, the library will probably return to its peaceful state. Thank you so much for contributing to the Library Restoration project.
Please straighten up the story and bring me the fixed storybook.
